Module uk.gov.gchq.eventlogging

Package event.logging.impl

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EventSerializer
    This interface is used to define a method that will serialise an Event object tree into a String representation of the object.
    LogReceiver
    Interface for classes used to receive serialised events.
    ValidationErrorHandler
    An error handler for XML validation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultEventLoggingService
    This is the default implementation of EventLoggingService for logging events.
    DefaultEventSerializer  
    DefaultXMLValidator  
    EventLoggerBuilderImpl<T_EVENT_ACTION extends EventAction>  
    EventLoggerBuilderImpl.ActionSubBuilderImpl<T_EVENT_ACTION extends EventAction>  
    EventLoggerBuilderImpl.ResultSubBuilderImpl<T_EVENT_ACTION extends EventAction,​T_RESULT>  
    ExceptionAndLoggingErrorHandler
    Logs all levels of validation event and throws a SAXParseException for an error or fatalError event.
    LoggerLogReceiver
    Default LogReceiver that uses the supplied serializer to create a string and writes it to a log via Log4J.
    LoggingErrorHandler
    Logs all SAXParseExceptions encountered during validation (fatal, error and warning) to a Logger.
    LogReceiverFactory
    If you want the serialised XML events to be consumed by something other than SLF4J then create your own implementation of LogReceiver and set the Java system property event.logging.logreceiver to the class name of your class.
    MockEventLoggerBuilder<T_EVENT_ACTION extends EventAction>  
    MockEventLoggerBuilder.MockActionSubBuilder<T_EVENT_ACTION extends EventAction>  
    MockEventLoggerBuilder.MockResultSubBuilder<T_EVENT_ACTION extends EventAction,​T_RESULT>  
    MockEventLoggingService
    A mock implementation of EventLoggingService that can be used for unit test code that uses EventLoggingService and needs a simple implementation that does not log.
    QuietErrorHandler
    Logs all SAXParseExceptions to a Logger at DEBUG level only.
    SchemaLocator  
    XMLUtil
    A utility class used to escape XML content.
    XMLWriter  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ValidationExceptionBehaviourMode  
    XMLWriter.XMLVersion
